abstract: The vice chairman and chief executive of the $28 billion General Electric‘s GE Industrial unit, Lloyd G. Trotter, will step down next month to join a small New York buyout firm called GenNx360 Capital Partners, BusinessWeek reported.
lead_paragraph: The vice chairman and chief executive of the $28 billion General Electric‘s GE Industrial unit, Lloyd G. Trotter, will step down next month to join a small New York buyout firm called GenNx360 Capital Partners, BusinessWeek reported.

headline.main: G.E. Executive to Join Private Equity Firm
